mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes the articles entitled "The Great American Dance", "What's Cooking With McNamara's Band?", "Wot's N A Hat", "The Unusual Is Always Fun", This edition also includes the monthly articles entitled "On the Record", "Idea Corral", "Round the Outside Ring" and "From the Floor" (letters to the editor). The article "Movie Sets In Order" is a featured article about Hollywood movies that show square dancing. The "Green Sheet Of Local Southern California News" features, "Southern California Callers Meeting Draws 200 To Plummer Park".
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
